text: Shiv Mahima is a 1992 Indian mythological movie produced by Gulshan Kumar under the banner of Super Cassettes Industries Ltd. It was directed by Shantilal Soni and written by Bhring Toopkari, and stars Arun Govil and Reshma Singh. The music was composed by Arun Paudwal. ==Cast== *Arun Govil as Shiv ji *Reshma Singh *Kiran Juneja *Gulshan Grover *Gajendra Chauhan *Gulshan Kumar *Kewal Shah ==Songs== * O Bhole Shankar Padharo \- * Hey Shabhu Baba Mere Bhole Nath - This song sang by hari haran - * Bum Bhole Kailashnath Mahima Teri Sabse Mahaan - ==References== Category:Indian films Category:1992 films Category:T-Series films Category:Hindu mythological films
title: Shiv Mahima
